Title: Bag of Cobras
Writer: Julie Plec (created by), Michael Russo, Michelle Paradise, L.J. Smith (based in part on the character Klaus from "The Vampire Diaries" novels by)
Actors: Joseph Morgan, Daniel Gillies, Phoebe Tonkin, Charles Michael Davis
Plot: When it's discovered that The Hollow has employed a mysterious servant to do its bidding, Klaus and Elijah host an elaborate party in order to lure the new threat out and uncover its identity.
